familyregisteredyn.description: Is there a family member registered with access to this patient.

lastloginentity.description: Either "PATIENT" or "FAMILY", the last entity who accessed this patient.

noportalyn.description: The privacy setting for blocking the patient from the portal is set.

portalregistrationdate.description: The date the patient registered for the portal.

status.description: The status of the patient. Possible statuses: REGISTERED: The patient is registered for the portal. NOTREGISTERED: The patient is not registered for the portal. FAMILYLOGIN: This patient is set up for a family member to login. NOPORTAL: The privacy setting for blocking the patient from the portal is set. BLOCKEDFAILEDLOGINS: The patient is blocked because of failed login attempts. FAMILYBLOCKEDFAILEDLOGINS: The family member is blocked because of failed login attempts.

termsaccepted.description: Has this patient accepted the portal's Terms and Conditions. This is a good indicator if the patient has actually logged in to the portal or simply is registered without ever having logged in.

registeredyn.description: If this patient is registered or not for the portal.

blockedfailedloginsyn.description: Is this patient blocked from the portal due to failed login attempts.

familyblockedfailedloginsyn.description: Is this patient's family blocked from the portal due to failed login attempts.
